# Generated Figures Directory

This directory contains all figures generated by the reproducibility scripts.

## Auto-Generated Files

After running `python src/reproduce_figures.py`, this directory will contain:

| File | Figure # | Description |
|------|----------|-------------|
| `fig01_hybrid_architecture.png` | 1 | Hybrid ML-PDE workflow diagram |
| `a.png` | 2 | European call & American put pricing comparison |
| `a3.png` | 3 | Training history (data + PDE anchor loss) |
| `a1.png` | 4 | Asian option 2D surface |
| `a2.png` | 5 | Barrier option surfaces (PDE vs ML) |
| `a4.png` | 6 (top) | Basket scalability: NRMSE and timing |
| `a4a.png` | 6 (bottom) | Basket scalability: evaluation time and parity plots |
| `a5a.png` | 7 (left) | PDE convergence analysis |
| `a5b.png` | 7 (right) | Neural network convergence analysis |
| `a6.png` | 8 | Benchmark comparison |
| `a7.png` | 9 | Error-time tradeoff |
| `a7a.png` | 10 | Pricing error vs strike |
| `a7b.png` | 11 | Robustness analysis |

## Usage

Figures are automatically saved here when running any script from `src/`.

**Note:** This directory is tracked by Git, but the .png files are gitignored. Only commit example figures if needed.

---

**Authors: Prof. Edson Pindza et al.**
